title: House of Wax lobby cards
brief_description: Reproduction movie lobby card set for the promotio of the film ‘House of Wax’ a Warner Brothers production c1953. The set contains a series of eight colour pinted cards with illustrated scenes from the movie and graphic text noting ‘Natural Vision, Color by Warner Color, 3 Dimension, House of Wax.
